original_title: ザ・スパイダースのゴーゴー・向う見ず作戦
overview: The Spiders, a Japanese pop group, in their first starring role, walk from Yokohama to Tokyo, to prove their love for a girl who told them "the person who can overcome any obstacle will be my lover"! Neither traffic, buildings, nor the police can stop them, in this madcap rock musical adventure!
tagline: The Spiders Go! Go! Let's Go!
title: The Spiders' The Reckless Operation
